p: We have succeeded to identify some of the interesting fractions generated by the mother extract and specified the compounds responsible for antioxidant activities. In fact, it can be said that, for Î²-carotene test, antioxidants are concentrated in hexane fractions SH4, SA5, and SA10. For DPPH test, fractions SH8, SA5, SA10, and SA11 include the active entities of Nigella sativa L. Future research should explore the active fractions in vitro and compare their antioxidant activity in animal models before and after induction of diseases caused by oxidative stress.
